pageContext.Name: Powder Blue Chevron Designer Lehenga Size 12-14 (Bust 42")
pageContext.Description:
Fully embroidered baby blue lehenga with cream, dark blue and yellow threadwork chevrons throughout.

Heavily embroidered yellow and blue thread work blouse with cups and an open back design.

Embroidery around back blouse cut out.

Sleeve material provided.

Soft net dupatta with matching chevron border and tassels.

Bust size 42"

UK 12-14

Please measure your bust so you get the most accurate fit.

For any questions about measurements or how to measure your bust please see our size chart

https://www.shernilondon.com/sizeguide
